title: Music from the motion picture The bridges of Madison County : [piano, vocal, chords].
description: This album-matching folio features many mood-setting pieces including the beautiful love theme composed by Clint Eastwood. Titles Blue Gardenia * Doe Eyes (Love Theme from The Bridges of Madison County) * Easy Living * For All We Know * I'll Close My Eyes * It Was Almost Like a Song * Soft Winds.
author: Warner Brothers Publications
